channel.title: My App Npm on Getsrevel
channel.description: Recent content in My App Npm on Getsrevel

item.description: This project was bootstrapped with Create React App. Available Scripts In the project directory, you can run: yarn start Runs the app in the development mode. Open http://localhost:3000 to view it in the browser. The page will reload if you make edits. You will also see any lint errors in the console. yarn test Launches the test runner in the interactive watch mode. See the section about running tests for more information.
